00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 
00013 // Data Structure for this object
00014 typedef struct _dataspace{
00015         t_object                ob;     
00016         void                    *obex;
00017         void                    *outlet_active;
00018         void                    *outlet_native;
00019         DataspaceLib    *dataspace;
00020         long                    ac;                                             // for return values from the dataspace conversion
00021         t_atom                  *av;                                    //      ...
00022         t_symbol                *attr_dataspace;                // name of the dataspace -- e.g. "temperature"
00023         t_symbol                *attr_dataspace_active; // name of the current unit within the dataspace -- e.g. "celsius"
00024         t_symbol                *attr_dataspace_native; // name of the desired native unit within the dataspace -- e.g. "celsius"
00025 } t_dataspace;
00026 
00027 
00028 // Prototypes for methods
00029 void*           dataspace_new(t_symbol *name, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00030 void            dataspace_free(t_dataspace *obj);
00031 void            dataspace_assist(t_dataspace *obj, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00032 void            dataspace_int(t_dataspace *obj, long x);
00033 void            dataspace_float(t_dataspace *obj, double x);
00034 void            dataspace_list(t_dataspace *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00035 void            dataspace_getDataspaces(t_dataspace *obj);
00036 void            dataspace_getUnits(t_dataspace *obj);
00037 t_max_err       dataspace_setDataspace(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00038 t_max_err       dataspace_setDataspaceActive(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00039 t_max_err       dataspace_setDataspaceNative(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00040 
00041 
00042 // Globals
00043 t_class         *dataspace_class;
00044 
00045 
00046 /************************************************************************************/
00047 // Main() Function
00048 
00049 int main(void)
00050 {
00051         t_class *c;
00052         
00053         jamoma_init();
00054 
00055         // Define our class
00056         c = class_new("jcom.dataspace",(method)dataspace_new, (method)dataspace_free, (short)sizeof(t_dataspace), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00057         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_dataspace, obex));
00058 
00059         // Make methods accessible for our class:
00060         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_int,                       "int",                          A_GIMME, 0);
00061         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_float,                     "float",                        A_GIMME, 0);
00062         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_list,                      "list",                         A_GIMME, 0);
00063         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_getDataspaces,     "dataspaces.get",       0);
00064         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_getUnits,          "units.get",            A_GIMME, 0);
00065         class_addmethod(c, (method)dataspace_assist,            "assist",                       A_CANT, 0); 
00066     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,     "dumpout",                      A_CANT, 0);  
00067     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,    "quickref",                     A_CANT, 0);
00068 
00069         class_addattr(c, 
00070                 attr_offset_new("dataspace", _sym_symbol, 0,
00071                 (method)0, (method)dataspace_setDataspace, calcoffset(t_dataspace, attr_dataspace)));
00072         class_addattr(c, 
00073                 attr_offset_new("unit.active", _sym_symbol, 0,
00074                 (method)0, (method)dataspace_setDataspaceActive, calcoffset(t_dataspace, attr_dataspace_active)));
00075         class_addattr(c, 
00076                 attr_offset_new("unit.native", _sym_symbol, 0,
00077                 (method)0, (method)dataspace_setDataspaceNative, calcoffset(t_dataspace, attr_dataspace_native)));
00078 
00079         // Finalize our class
00080         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00081         dataspace_class = c;
00082         return 0;
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 /************************************************************************************/
00087 // Object Life
00088 
00089 void *dataspace_new(t_symbol *name, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00090 {
00091         t_dataspace *obj;                                                                       // Declare an object (based on our struct)
00092 
00093         obj = (t_dataspace *)object_alloc(dataspace_class);             // Create object, store pointer to it (get 1 inlet free)
00094         if(obj){
00095                 object_obex_store((void *)obj, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(obj,NULL));
00096             obj->outlet_native = outlet_new(obj, 0);
00097             obj->outlet_active = outlet_new(obj, 0);
00098                 obj->dataspace = NULL;
00099                 obj->attr_dataspace_active = _sym_nothing;
00100                 obj->attr_dataspace_native = _sym_nothing;
00101 
00102                 attr_args_process(obj, argc, argv);
00103                 if(!obj->dataspace)
00104                         object_attr_setsym(obj, gensym("dataspace"), gensym("temperature"));
00105 
00106                 obj->av = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom) * 3);   // just allocating three for now -- limited list support
00107         }
00108         return obj;                                                                             // Return pointer to our instance
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 void dataspace_free(t_dataspace *obj)
00113 {
00114         sysmem_freeptr(obj->av);
00115         if(obj->dataspace)
00116                 delete obj->dataspace;
00117 }

00120 /************************************************************************************/
00121 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00122 
00123 // Method for Assistance Messages
00124 void dataspace_assist(t_dataspace *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00125 {
00126         if(msg==1)                                                      // Inlets
00127                 strcpy(dst, "x");
00128         else if(msg==2){                                        // Outlets
00129                 switch(arg){
00130                         case 0: strcpy(dst, "y=f(x)"); break;
00131                         default: strcpy(dst, "dumpout"); break;
00132                 }
00133         }
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 void dataspace_int(t_dataspace *obj, long x)
00138 {
00139         dataspace_float(obj, (double)x);
00140 }
00141 
00142 
00143 void dataspace_float(t_dataspace *obj, double x)
00144 {
00145         t_atom  a[1];
00146         
00147         atom_setfloat(a, x);
00148         obj->dataspace->convert(1, a, &obj->ac, &obj->av);
00149         outlet_anything(obj->outlet_native, _sym_float, obj->ac, obj->av);
00150         outlet_float(obj->outlet_active, x);
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00154 void dataspace_list(t_dataspace *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00155 {
00156         obj->dataspace->convert(argc, argv, &obj->ac, &obj->av);
00157         outlet_anything(obj->outlet_native, _sym_list, obj->ac, obj->av);
00158         outlet_anything(obj->outlet_active, _sym_list, argc, argv);
00159 }
00160         
00161 
00162 void dataspace_getDataspaces(t_dataspace *obj)
00163 {
00164         t_atom          a[2];
00165         t_symbol        **dataspaceNames = NULL;
00166         long            numDataspaces = 0;
00167         long            i;
00168         
00169         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("clear"));
00170         object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("DataspacesMenu"), 1, a);
00171         
00172         jamoma_getDataspaceList(&numDataspaces, &dataspaceNames);
00173         
00174         for(i=0; i<numDataspaces; i++){
00175                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("append"));
00176                 atom_setsym(a+1, dataspaceNames[i]);
00177                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("DataspacesMenu"), 2, a);
00178         }
00179         
00180         if(numDataspaces)
00181                 sysmem_freeptr(dataspaceNames);
00182 }
00183 
00184 
00185 void dataspace_getUnits(t_dataspace *obj)
00186 {
00187         t_atom          a[2];
00188         t_symbol        **unitNames = NULL;
00189         long            numUnits = 0;
00190         long            i;
00191         
00192         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("clear"));
00193         object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("UnitMenu"), 1, a);
00194         
00195         obj->dataspace->getAvailableUnits(&numUnits, &unitNames);
00196         
00197         for(i=0; i<numUnits; i++){
00198                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("append"));
00199                 atom_setsym(a+1, unitNames[i]);
00200                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("UnitMenu"), 2, a);
00201         }
00202         
00203         if(numUnits)
00204                 sysmem_freeptr(unitNames);
00205 }

00208 // ATTRIBUTE:
00209 t_max_err dataspace_setDataspace(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00210 {
00211         obj->attr_dataspace = atom_getsym(argv);
00212         jamoma_getDataspace(obj->attr_dataspace, &obj->dataspace);
00213         obj->attr_dataspace_active = obj->dataspace->neutralUnit;
00214         obj->attr_dataspace_native = obj->dataspace->neutralUnit;
00215         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00216 }
00217 
00218 
00219 // ATTRIBUTE:
00220 t_max_err dataspace_setDataspaceActive(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00221 {
00222         obj->attr_dataspace_active = atom_getsym(argv);
00223         obj->dataspace->setInputUnit(obj->attr_dataspace_active);
00224         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00225 }
00226 
00227 
00228 // ATTRIBUTE:
00229 t_max_err dataspace_setDataspaceNative(t_dataspace *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00230 {
00231         obj->attr_dataspace_native = atom_getsym(argv);
00232         obj->dataspace->setOutputUnit(obj->attr_dataspace_native);
00233         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00234 }
